author: Brian Hutton, Fiach Kelly
title: ‘So shocking’: RTÉ’s Claire Byrne on her positive coronavirus test
description: Simon Coveney tests negative for virus after being in ‘close contact’ with confirmed case
content:
RTÉ presenter Claire Byrne has said she felt guilty, shocked and worried after being diagnosed with Covid-19.
Speaking about her experience while co-hosting her Claire Byrne Live show in self-isolation from her garden shed on Monday night, she told viewers s… [+2844 chars]
